partners.pid: MAPLE is an initiative of Partners in Democracy - Education, a 501(c)(3) non profit organization. Partners In Democracy is building nationwide partnerships and exploring how we can drive democracy renovation efforts forward in states around the country â€” starting by focusing our efforts here at home in Massachusetts.

short_description: MAPLE makes it easy for anyone to view and submit testimony to the Massachusetts Legislature about the bills that will shape our future.
